feed.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3

entry.title: Combined summary - [PULL] Wallet Private Key Encryption Take 3
entry.summary: A new update on the Bitcoin wallet encryption has been shared on Github by Matt Corallo. The update has been rebased onto the wallet class and is now ready for "wtf is this crap" messages. Matt has requested final comments/ACKs for the pull request. More details can be found on the Github link provided.
